articles.author: Elsa Keslassy
articles.title: Austin Butler Set to Star as Patrick Bateman in Luca Guadagnino’s ‘American Psycho’ (EXCLUSIVE) - Variety
articles.description: Austin Butler is set to star as Patrick Bateman in Luca Guadagnino's fresh take on the book 'American Psycho' by Bret Easton Ellis for Lionsgate.
articles.content:
Austin Butler is set to star in Luca Guadagnino‘s new interpretation of the book “American Psycho” by Bret Easton Ellis for Lionsgate.
While there had been rumors that Jacob Elordi was being eyed to… [+1385 chars]
